ctu_text:
3. Improve the wage earnings of the craftsmen by leading them into collectivization 4. Create linkages with producer organizations to inculcate entrepreneurship skills and aptitude in the trainees.
> **Vision of the scheme:** The artisans who form the backbone of the craft sector work in an exploitative chain of business leading them to a vicious cycle of poverty and pessimism.
